net.sf.click.extras.panel
Class ListPanel

java.lang.Object
  net.sf.click.extras.panel.BasicPanel
      net.sf.click.extras.panel.ListPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
Control, Panel, Serializable
public class ListPanel
extends BasicPanel

Provides a method of adding multiple panels that will be listed out in a vertical fashion, each panel being evaluated via Velocity's #parse(), and by default, surrounded with a <div> with the id of the list panel when instantiated. 

 <div id="$_lp_id">
   #foreach ($panel in $_lp_panels)
     <div id="$panel.id">
       #parse($panel)
     </div>
   #end
 </div>
As you can see, by default, the 'id' for this list panel will be put into the model context as "_lp_id" and the list of sub-panels will be put in as "_lp_panels" (the odd naming convention is to avoid conflict with user model context objects)

Author:
Phil Barnes
See Also:
Serialized Form

Constant Field Values
Constructor Detail

ListPanel

public ListPanel(String id)
Default constructor includes the id of this list panel. This id will be used to wrap the entire list of sub-panels in a <div> element so that the list itself may be stylized with CSS. This id will be made available in the internal name "_lp_id".

Parameters:
id -

ListPanel

public ListPanel()
Default no-args constructor used to deploy panel resources.

No-args constructors are provided for resource deployment and are not intended for general use.

Method Detail

addPanel

public void addPanel(Panel panel)
Overridden method to capture and add the panels to the model with an internal name ("_lp_panels") so that the template may iterate over this name for each panel that was added to the list.

Overrides:
addPanel in class BasicPanel
Parameters:
panel - the panel to add

onDeploy

public void onDeploy(javax.servlet.ServletContext servletContext)

toString

public String toString()
Overridden toString to add the path '/click/' to the beginning of the template name, as the template file will be copied to this directory upon first time start of ClickServlet

Overrides:

the default template path and name of '/click/ListPanel.htm'
